snippet: In a surprising reversal, the board of the budget airline, Ryanair, said it had not approved plans to offer flights between North America and Europe.
abstract: Irish budget airline Ryanair, in surprising reversal, says it has not approved plans to offer ultracheap flights between United States and Europe.
lead_paragraph: In a surprising reversal, the board of the budget airline, Ryanair, said it had not approved plans to offer flights between North America and Europe.
